title: 27 T206 Individually Priced: HOF, C460  NEW CARDS 3/26
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: 27 T206 Individually Priced: HOF, C460  NEW CARDS 3/26
posts.post_content:
Simply add $5 per order to cover shipping regardless of the number of cards.  Price per card is net to me.  Scans available at: [url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/t206hound/n54-for-sale[/url]
